Documentation: Is part of the unique identification of a stock object bundle.
Unique identification of a loading aid (see LoadAid).
It defines how long a loading unit is expected to be stored in the warehouse.
It specifies the minimum height of the loading unit.
It specifies the maximum height of the loading unit.
It specifies the minimum weight of the loading unit.
It specifies the maximum weight of the loading unit.
It refers to a customizable stock-identifying attribute, which is considered during the storage location search.
